response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we are confident it would be a valuable asset to your endeavors. We are offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000, considering its worth to you is $800,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a competitive price. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
